steps.title: Welcome to VoltiaCar
steps.intro: This is your main screen. Here you can see all important information about your account and access all carsharing service features.

steps.title: Available Time
steps.intro: Here you can see the time you have left to use the vehicles. This time is deducted while you use a vehicle. When it runs out, you can buy more time.

steps.title: Search and Locate Vehicles
steps.intro: Click here to see a map with all available vehicles near you. You can search for vehicles by location, type, or availability.

steps.title: Vehicle Control
steps.intro: When you have a reserved vehicle, here you can control it: start the engine, activate lights, horn, and more functions.

steps.title: Buy Time
steps.intro: When you run out of time, you can buy more minutes here. There are different packages available according to your needs.

steps.title: Your Profile
steps.intro: Here you can view and edit your personal information, change password, manage payment methods, and configure your preferences.

steps.title: Log Out
steps.intro: When you finish using the application, click here to log out securely and protect your account.

steps.title: Accessibility Options
steps.intro: You can access accessibility options to adjust text size, contrast, and other settings to improve your experience.

steps.title: Registration Form
steps.intro: Fill out this form with your personal information to create a new account on VoltiaCar.

steps.title: Full Name
steps.intro: Enter your full name. This information will be used to identify you in the system.

steps.title: Email Address
steps.intro: Enter your email address. We will use it to send you confirmations and important notifications.

steps.title: Password
steps.intro: Create a secure password with at least 8 characters, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and numbers.

steps.title: Confirm Password
steps.intro: Re-enter the same password to confirm it and avoid errors.

steps.title: Create Account
steps.intro: When you have filled in all fields, click here to create your account and start using VoltiaCar.

steps.title: Log In
steps.intro: Enter your credentials to access your VoltiaCar account.

steps.title: Email Address
steps.intro: Enter the email address you used to register.

steps.title: Password
steps.intro: Enter your password. If you have forgotten it, you can use the recovery option.

steps.title: Sign In
steps.intro: Click here to log in and access your dashboard.

steps.title: Your Profile
steps.intro: This is your profile page where you can view and edit all your personal information.

steps.title: Profile Picture
steps.intro: You can change your profile picture by clicking on it. This will help you personalize your account.

steps.title: Edit Name
steps.intro: You can update your name at any time. Changes will be saved automatically.

steps.title: Email Address
steps.intro: Your email address is important for receiving notifications. Make sure it is up to date.

steps.title: Phone Number
steps.intro: Add or update your phone number for urgent communications or account verification.

steps.title: Change Password
steps.intro: For security, you can change your password regularly. Click here to access this option.

steps.title: Save Changes
steps.intro: After making any modifications, don't forget to save the changes by clicking this button.

steps.title: Vehicle Search
steps.intro: Use this page to search for available vehicles according to your search criteria.

steps.title: Location
steps.intro: Enter the location where you need the vehicle. You can use addresses, postal codes, or neighborhood names.

steps.title: Date and Time
steps.intro: Select when you need the vehicle. You can book in advance or for immediate use.

steps.title: Vehicle Type
steps.intro: Choose the type of vehicle you need: electric car, motorcycle, bicycle, etc.

steps.title: Search
steps.intro: Click here to see all available vehicles that match your criteria.

steps.title: Search Results
steps.intro: Here you will see all available vehicles with information about model, battery, distance, and price.

steps.title: Vehicle Details
steps.intro: Click on any vehicle to see more details and booking options.

steps.title: Vehicle Map
steps.intro: This map shows all available vehicles near you in real time. The blue dot is you, and the markers are vehicles.

steps.title: Navigate the Map
steps.intro: You can zoom with the + and - buttons, or drag the map to explore different areas of the city.

steps.title: Vehicle Markers
steps.intro: Each marker represents an available vehicle. Colors indicate battery level: green (high), yellow (medium), red (low).

steps.title: Vehicle Information
steps.intro: Click on any map marker to see vehicle information: model, license plate, battery, and distance to you.

steps.title: Details and Booking
steps.intro: In the popup window you can see all vehicle details and click 'Book' to claim it.

steps.title: Your Location
steps.intro: Click this button to center the map on your current location and see the nearest vehicles.

steps.title: Vehicle List
steps.intro: In addition to the map, you can see a list of all vehicles with their distance sorted from nearest to farthest.

steps.title: Booking Form
steps.intro: Fill out this form to complete the booking of the vehicle you have selected.

steps.title: Vehicle Details
steps.intro: Review the information of the vehicle you have selected: model, license plate, location, and battery status.

steps.title: Start Date and Time
steps.intro: Select when you want to start using the vehicle. You can book for right now or for later.

steps.title: End Date and Time
steps.intro: Indicate when you expect to return the vehicle. This helps us plan availability.

steps.title: Price Summary
steps.intro: Here you can see the estimated cost of the booking: unlock fee, cost per minute, and approximate total.

steps.title: Terms and Conditions
steps.intro: Read and accept the service terms and conditions before confirming the booking.

steps.title: Confirm Booking
steps.intro: When you are ready, click here to confirm the booking. You will receive a confirmation by email.

steps.title: Payment Information
steps.intro: A pre-authorization will be made on your card as a security deposit. The final charge will be made after returning the vehicle.

steps.title: Control Panel
steps.intro: From here you can remotely control your reserved vehicle. Make sure you are near the vehicle before using these functions.

steps.title: Horn
steps.intro: Activate the vehicle's horn to find it more easily if you don't see it. It's especially useful in large parking lots.

steps.title: Lights
steps.intro: Turn on the vehicle's lights to identify it better, especially at night or in poorly lit areas.

steps.title: Lock/Unlock
steps.intro: You can lock or unlock the vehicle doors remotely. Make sure you are nearby to use this function.

steps.title: Start Engine
steps.intro: When you are inside the vehicle and ready to start the trip, click here to start the engine.

steps.title: Stop Engine
steps.intro: When you reach your destination, turn off the engine here to end the trip and calculate the final cost.

steps.title: Battery Level
steps.intro: You can see the current battery level of the vehicle. Make sure it has enough charge for your journey.

steps.title: Trip Information
steps.intro: Here you can see the elapsed time, distance traveled, and accumulated cost of the current trip.

steps.title: Time Packages
steps.intro: Here you can see the different time packages available. Choose the one that best suits your usage needs.

steps.title: Basic Package
steps.intro: The basic package is ideal for occasional use. It includes a small amount of minutes at an affordable price.

steps.title: Package Information
steps.intro: Each package clearly shows how many minutes you will get, the total price, and the price per minute. Larger packages offer better value.

steps.title: Recommended Package
steps.intro: This is the most popular package among our users. It offers a good balance between price and number of minutes.

steps.title: Buy Package
steps.intro: Click the buy button of the package you want. You will be redirected to the secure payment page.

steps.title: Payment Methods
steps.intro: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment methods. Minutes will be added to your account immediately.

steps.title: Accessibility Options
steps.intro: Here you can adjust various options to improve your user experience according to your needs.

steps.title: Text Size
steps.intro: You can increase or decrease the text size of the entire application to facilitate reading.

steps.title: High Contrast
steps.intro: Activate high contrast mode to improve the visibility of text and interface elements.

steps.title: Dyslexia Font
steps.intro: You can switch to a font specially designed to facilitate reading for people with dyslexia.

steps.title: Language
steps.intro: Change the application language between Catalan, Spanish, and English according to your preferences.

steps.title: Voice Control
steps.intro: Activate voice control to navigate the application using voice commands.

steps.title: Save Preferences
steps.intro: Your accessibility preferences are saved automatically and will be applied every time you log in.

messages.completed: You have completed the tutorial! Now you can use all VoltiaCar features.
